Verses: 1 naan Meyyaana Dhraatchachedi, En Pidhaa Dhraatchath Thottakkaarar.
2 ennil Kanikodaadhirukkira Kodi Edhuvo Adhai Avar Aruththuppodugiraar; Kanikodukkira Kodi Edhuvo, Adhu Adhiga Kanigalaik Kodukkumpadi, Adhai Suththampannugiraar.
3 naan Ungalukku Sonna Ubadhesaththinaale Neengal Ippozhudhe Suththamaayirukkireergal.

4 ennil Nilaiththirungal, Naanum Ungalil Nilaiththiruppen; Kodiyaanadhu Dhraatchachediyil Nilaiththiraavittaal Adhu Thaanaaik Kanikodukkamaattaadhadhupola, Neengalum Ennil Nilaiththiraavittaal, Kanikodukkamaatteergal.
5 naane Dhraatchachedi, Neengal Kodigal. Oruvan Ennilum Naan Avanilum Nilaiththirundhaal, Avan Migundha Kanigalaik Koduppaan; Ennaiyallaamal Ungalaal Ondrum Seyyakkoodaadhu.
6 oruvan Ennil Nilaiththiraavittaal, Veliye Eriyunda Kodiyaippola Avan Eriyundu Ularndhu Povaan; Appadippattavaigalai Serththu, Akkiniyile Podugiraargal; Avaigal Erindhupom.
7 neengal Ennilum, En Vaarththaigal Ungalilum Nilaiththirundhaal, Neengal Kettukkolvadhedhuvo Adhu Ungalukku Seyyappadum.
8 neengal Migundha Kanigalaik Koduppadhinaal En Pidhaa Magimaippaduvaar, Enakkum Seesharaayiruppeergal.
9 pidhaa Ennil Anbaayirukkiradhupola Naanum Ungalil Anbaayirukkiren; Ennudaiya Anbile Nilaiththirungal.
10 naan En Pidhaavin Karpanaigalaik Kaikkondu Avarudaiya Anbile Nilaiththirukkiradhupola, Neengalum En Karpanaigalaik Kaikkondirundhaal, Ennudaiya Anbile Nilaiththiruppeergal.
11 ennudaiya Sandhosham Ungalil Nilaiththirukkumpadikkum, Ungal Sandhosham Niraivaayirukkumpadikkum, Ivaigalai Ungalukku Sonnen.
12 naan Ungalil Anbaayirukkiradhupola Neengalum Oruvariloruvar Anbaayirukkavendumenbadhe Ennudaiya Karpanaiyaayirukkiradhu.
13 oruvan Than Snegidharukkaagath Than Jeevanaik Kodukkira Anbilum Adhigamaana Anbu Oruvaridaththilumillai.
14 naan Ungalukkuk Karpikkira Yaavaiyum Neengal Seyveergalaanaal, En Snegidharaayiruppeergal.

15 ini Naan Ungalai Oozhiyakkaararendru Sollugiradhillai, Oozhiyakkaaran Than Ejamaan Seygiradhai Ariyamaattaan. Naan Ungalai Snegidhar Endren, Enenil En Pidhaavinidaththil Naan Kelvippatta Ellaavatraiyum Ungalukku Ariviththen.

16 neengal Ennaith Therindhukollavillai, Naan Ungalaith Therindhukonden; Neengal En Naamaththinaale Pidhaavaik Kettukkolvadhu Edhuvo, Adhai Avar Ungalukkuk Kodukkaththakkadhaaga Neengal Poik Kanikodukkumpadikkum, Ungal Kani Nilaiththirukkumpadikkum, Naan Ungalai Erpaduththinen.
17 neengal Oruvariloruvar Anbaayirukkavendumendre Ivaigalai Ungalukkuk Karpikkiren.
18 ulagam Ungalaip Pagaiththaal, Adhu Ungalaip Pagaikkiradharkumunne Ennaip Pagaiththadhendru Ariyungal.

19 neengal Ulagaththaaraayirundhaal, Ulagam Thannudaiyadhai Snegiththirukkum; Neengal Ulagaththaaraayiraadhapadiyinaalum, Naan Ungalai Ulagaththilirundhu Therindhukondapadiyinaalum, Ulagam Ungalaip Pagaikkiradhu.

20 oozhiyakkaaran Than Ejamaanilum Periyavanallavendru Naan Ungalukku Sonna Vaarththaiyai Ninaiththukkollungal. Avargal Ennaith Thunbappaduththinadhundaanaal, Ungalaiyum Thunbappaduththuvaargal; Avargal En Vasanaththaik Kaikkondadhundaanaal, Ungal Vasanaththaiyum Kaikkolluvaargal.
21 avargal Ennai Anuppinavarai Ariyaadhapadiyinaal En Naamaththinimiththame Ivaigalaiyellaam Ungalukku Seyvaargal.
22 naan Vandhu Avargalidaththil Pesaadhirundhenaanaal Avargalukkup Paavamiraadhu; Ippozhudho Thangal Paavaththaikkuriththup Pokkuchcholla Avargalukku Idamillai.
23 ennaip Pagaikkiravan En Pidhaavaiyum Pagaikkiraan.
24 veroruvarum Seyyaadha Kiriyaigalai Naan Avargalukkulle Seyyaadhirundhenaanaal, Avargalukkup Paavamiraadhu; Ippozhudhu Avargal Ennaiyum En Pidhaavaiyum Kandum Pagaiththumirukkiraargal.
25 mugaandharamillaamal Ennaip Pagaiththaargal Endru Avargaludaiya Vedhaththil Ezhudhiyirukkira Vaakkiyam Niraiverumpadikku Ippadiyaayitru.

26 pidhaavinidaththilirundhu Naan Ungalukku Anuppappogiravarum, Pidhaavinidaththilirundhu Purappadugiravarumaagiya Saththiya Aaviyaana Thetraravaalan Varumbodhu, Avar Ennaikkuriththu Saatchikoduppaar.
27 neengalum Aadhimudhal Ennudanekooda Irundhapadiyaal Enakku Saatchigalaayiruppeergal.
